nodes.text: Trueping's was a bar on Coruscant. It was located in Slum district G17, next to Lauli Wahlo's noodle shop and Noodle Bar, between Chezdeze and a massage parlor. In 21 BBY after supposedly killing Obi-Wan Kenobi, Rako Hardeen went there to celebrate. It may have been a dodgy cantina, but it was very popular, with posters promoting it.
Trueping's employed at least one or two bartenders. The most notable one was the Anacondan who hung from a rack and used his tail and coil to serve drinks and take money.
The name of the bar is a reference to The Clone Wars concept artist Tara Rueping.
